Hello,

VaporNode is a dedicated server provider with employees that have been involved in the hosting and IT industry for 7+ years. We plan to bring our expertise to VaporNode to grow it into one of the definitive dedicated server providers in Chicago. The below offer consists of hardware located within Continuum's suburban facility.


Advantages:

- Central Chicago location

- Remote management (IPMI / KVM free on request)

- Ship your own hardware (conditions apply, contact us for additional information)

- Personal support

- Free, unlimited OS reinstalls

- 8 hour setup guarantee (average of 2 hours)


**Xeon BDS Two:**

- CPU: Dual Intel Xeon L5420 (8 cores / 8 threads @ 2.5GHz)

- RAM: 16GB DDR2 ECC

- Storage: 500GB SATA HDD

- Network: 10TB bandwidth @ 1Gbps

- IP Addresses: 4 IPv4 and IPv6 on request

- **Price: $40/month with BDS2LE promotion code ([Order here](https://portal.vapornode.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=3))**


**Xeon BDS Three:**

- Storage: 500GB SATA HDD

- Network: 10TB bandwidth @ 1Gbps

- IP Addresses: 4 IPv4 and IPv6 on request

- **Price: $49/month with BDS3LE promotion code ([Order here](https://portal.vapornode.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=4))**

These are unmanaged servers with an optional management addon available at checkout.


Payment: We currently accept PayPal, credit cards, and debit cards. No refunds are permitted on dedicated servers.
